title: Latest Arby's Deals for Savings [February 4, 2026]
text: Arby’s Deals The current lineup includes the popular 2 for $6 Mix & Match deal where you can choose any two classic sandwiches like the Classic Roast Beef, Buffalo Chicken, or Chicken ‘n Cheese, plus ongoing promotions like $1 sliders during happy hour and the King’s Hawaiian Fish Deluxe for just $5.99. These rotating offers provide substantial savings on premium sandwiches, sides, and drinks, making it easier to enjoy quality fast food without stretching your budget. Free Sandwich Has Entered the Chat You get a free sandwich when you sign up for Arby’s Rewards texts. Just enter your phone number on their site or app, and once you’re subscribed, they’ll send you a deal code for a free sandwich—usually redeemable with a purchase. It’s a one-time welcome offer for new sign-ups. Free Delivery Every Monday Arby’s offers free delivery every Monday when you order through their app or website. No promo code needed—just place your order on a Monday, and the delivery fee is automatically waived. It’s a limited-time offer, so it’s best to take advantage while it lasts. 99¢ Fountain Drinks Once a Day You can get a drink for just 99¢ once a day with any $5+ order when you order through their app. No code needed—just meet the minimum and it applies automatically. This offer runs through August 3, so don’t miss out while it’s active. 20% Off Weekly You get 20% off one order per week when you order through the app. The discount is applied automatically at checkout and refreshes every week, so you can keep saving regularly. It’s a solid way to cut down on cost, especially if you’re craving premium items like their new steak sandwich or planning a bigger meal. 2 for $7 Mix‑N‑Match This deal lets you choose any two select menu items for just $7. It’s a flexible offer where you can mix favorites like the classic roast beef and crispy chicken sandwich. The goal is to give you variety and value in one go. It’s a solid pick for lunch or dinner when you’re looking for a quick, satisfying meal without overspending. Just check what’s included in the mix before ordering, as participating items can vary by location. For more details, check Arby’s 2 for $7 Menu. 2 for $6.99 Surf & Turf This offer lets you mix and match two select sandwiches for just $6.99, combining beef and fish options. You can go for items like the Beef ‘n Cheddar, Classic Fish Sandwich, or Fish ‘n Cheddar—depending on what’s available at your local restaurant. It’s a great low-cost combo if you’re in the mood for variety, especially with both land and sea flavors on the table. Just make sure to check with your nearby location, as availability may vary. Cheesesteak Sandwich (Limited Time) This loaded sandwich is back for a short run, featuring juicy Angus steak topped with melted American cheese, diced onions, and colorful peppers. It’s finished with garlic aioli and served on a warm, toasted roll—bringing bold flavors in every bite. It’s a premium option on the menu, perfect if you’re craving something hearty and filling. Since it’s only here for a limited time, it’s best to grab it before it disappears again. Potato Cakes (Permanent Return) These crispy hashbrown-style wedges were a fan favorite for years—and now they’re officially back for good. Arby’s brought them back permanently after major demand and even joked about legal guarantees to keep them around. Crispy on the outside and fluffy inside, they’re a perfect side with any meal. If you’ve missed them, there’s no rush this time—they’re staying on the menu for the long haul. How to Access These Deals? Download the App: Most deals are unlocked through the Arby’s app or by joining their Rewards program. Once you’re in, offers like free delivery, discounts, and freebies are applied automatically at checkout. It’s the easiest way to make sure you’re getting all available perks. Check Local Availability: Not every deal is offered everywhere. Specials like the 2 for $6.99 Surf & Turf may vary by location, so it’s a good idea to confirm with your local restaurant before ordering. This helps avoid surprises and ensures the deal applies at your spot. Sign Up for Texts or Emails: Stay in the loop by subscribing to Arby’s emails or text alerts. These updates often include exclusive, time-sensitive deals like free fries, drinks, or sandwiches—sometimes even before they hit the app. Winter 2026 Sales Arby’s Customer Service Official Arby’s restaurants resources: - Office: 1155 Perimeter Center West, Atlanta, Georgia 30338, USA - Contact Number: +1-800-599-2729 - Official Website: https://www.arbys.com/ - Locations: https://www.arbys.com/locations/ - Mobile Apps: Arby’s App - Arby’s Specials: Official Page - Support: https://www.arbys.com/contact-us/ - Arby’s Coupons - Careers: https://careers.arbys.com/
